plot outline: This movie is about six friends, post-college when a situation brings them back together. It shows the intricacy and bonding amongst these friends. It is a full-on entertainer having the right mix of love, emotions, friendship blended in drama and comedy which will keep u glued to your seats. The events in the movie are full of surprises with foot tapping and melodious songs.
title: Tari Maate Once More
